name: The Creative
description: The Gate of Self-Expression - The power of creative expression through individual action

channel.name: Inspiration
channel.description: The Channel of Inspiration - A Design of a Creative Role Model

signal.script: Your creative energy seeks expression. What small act of creation calls to you today?
experiments: Create something physical with your hands
Express yourself through movement or dance
Write or draw without judgment for 10 minutes

friction.script: You're experiencing creative resistance. This isn't lack of ability—it's energy seeking its proper channel. What feels natural to express right now?
experiments: Change your environment to inspire fresh perspective
Collaborate with someone who energizes your creativity
Lower the stakes—create something intentionally imperfect

breakpoint.script: Your creative self is undergoing transformation. This discomfort is actually recalibration. You're not losing your creativity—you're evolving it.
experiments: Document your creative journey without judgment
Explore a completely new creative medium
Mentor someone in your creative practice
